release_notes: New DarkMsgBox function, Import/Export settings, Contact Sheet toggle, GHL Invoice Warning dialog with Cancel button, dark mode improvements
changelog: NEW: Universal DarkMsgBox with dark mode, word wrap, multiple buttons, checkbox, timeout
NEW: Import/Export Settings (.skp encrypted files) for sharing between computers
NEW: Contact Sheet with Order toggle in Invoice tab
NEW: GHL Invoice Warning dialog with Cancel button and dark mode styling
FIX: Bold font inheritance on toggle labels
FIX: Installer referencing non-existent Python files
IMPROVED: All message boxes now use consistent dark mode styling
